Key Match Events: Utah Jazz lost to Sacramento Kings 113-96 at home.
Utah star Lauri Markkanen left the game at halftime with back spasms.
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Will Hardy mentioned the need to recalibrate and plug young players into new spots.
Walker Kessler emphasized the importance of supporting Taylor Hendricks during his recovery.
Others: Taylor Hendricks suffered a severe injury, breaking his right fibula and dislocating his ankle.
Hendricks' injury has left a significant void in the Jazz's defense.
Rookie Cody Williams stepped into the starting lineup against Sacramento.
